Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Music

Syntax

public class SlashMusic : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<MusicService>, IInteractionModuleBase

AutoPlay(int)

Command to set the autoplay behavior for adding songs to the queue.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("autoplay", "Set the amount of songs to add at the end of the queue.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task AutoPlay(int autoPlayNum)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int autoPlayNum

The number of songs to attempt to add to the queue when the last song is reached. Use 0 to disable autoplay.
Returns
Type Description
